產品 [ chǎn pǐn ]: goods; merchandise; product; Classifiers: 个
產業 [ chǎn yè ]: industry; estate; property; industrial

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You've stacked your products for so long you are higher than a cliff when you stand up on them.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions from " birth " to " birth ", " birth " is the original character of " yan ", in the word " birth " is the sound symbol (see Zhang Shichao, etc.), " birth " is the meaning symbol, which means birth.

In addition to being used as a person’s name, the inscription indicates birth. "Shuwen": "Birth, birth. Congsheng, Yan Shengsheng." Ai Cheng hangs the tripod: "Yu Zhengbang’s production." It means that I was born in Zheng State. . "Historical Records. "Li Si Biography": "The five sons were not born in Qin, but Miao shared them."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscriptions from " birth " to " birth ", " birth " is " yan " province, as a sound symbol, " birth " is a righteous symbol, which means birth.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「产」從「生」，「产」是「彥」的本字，在「產」字中是聲符(參張世超等)，「生」是義符，表示出生。

　　金文除用作人名外，表示出生，《說文》：「產，生也。从生，彥省聲。」哀成弔鼎：「余鄭邦之產。」意思是說我在鄭國出生。《史記．李斯列傳》：「此五子者，不產於秦，而繆公用之。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「产」從「生」，「产」是「彥」省，作為聲符，「生」是義符，表示出生。

Antonyms: 銷
Total strokes: 11; Radical: 生
Pictophonetic: 厂 indicates the sound; 生 (birth) conveys the meaning.

①人或動物生子：產子。產卵。產婦。助產士。
②製造，養種植或自然生長：工業生產。產值。
③製造、養、種植或自然生長的東西：土產。特產。
④生出，出現：產生。出產。產地。
⑤財物：財產。遺產。產權。

(Simplified: 产)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 銷
Pictophonetic: 厂 indicates the sound; 生 (birth) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 5
Chinese: You buy and save products for your whole life until you have so many that they stack as high as a cliff.  
Meaning: products
Hanzi: 产
Story: You've stacked your products for so long you are higher than a cliff when you stand up on them.
Kind: traditional

金文從「 产 」從「 生 」，「 产 」是「 彥 」的本字，在「 產 」字中是聲符(參張世超等)，「 生 」是義符，表示出生。 金文除用作人名外，表示出生，《說文》：「產，生也。从生，彥省聲。」哀成弔鼎：「余鄭邦之產。」意思是說我在鄭國出生。《史記．李斯列傳》：「此五子者，不產於秦，而繆公用之。」
Bronze inscriptions from " birth" to " birth", " birth" is the original character of " yan", in the word " birth" is the sound symbol (see Zhang Shichao, etc.), " birth" is the meaning symbol, which means birth. In addition to being used as a person’s name, the inscription indicates birth. "Shuwen": "Birth, birth. Congsheng, Yan Shengsheng." Ai Cheng hangs the tripod: "Yu Zhengbang’s production." It means that I was born in Zheng State. . "Historical Records. "Li Si Biography": "The five sons were not born in Qin, but Miao shared them."

產字的基本解释

產
chǎn
同“产”。

產字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǎn］
［《廣韻》所簡切，上産，生。］
“產1”的新字形。“产1”的繁体字。
(1)养育；生。
(2)指生养的子女。
(3)出生；生长。
(4)出产。
(5)出产之物；物产。
(6)产业。
(7)生活；生业。
(8)产生；发生。
(9)指发生变乱。
(10)泛指事物。
(11)牲畜。
(12)古管乐器名。籥之一种。
(13)用同“滻”。水名。
(14)姓。见《万姓统谱·潸韵》。

產字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【生字部】　產； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页755第09
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?所?切，音剗。【說文】生也。【正字通】婦生子曰產，物生亦曰產。【禮·鄕飮酒禮】產萬物者，聖也。【註】聖之言生也。【周禮·春官·大宗伯】以天產作隂德，以中禮防之。以地產作陽德，以和樂防之。【註】天產者動物，謂六牲之屬。地產者植物，謂九穀之屬。【前漢·昭帝紀】金芝九莖，產于函德殿銅池中。　又本其所生長之地曰產。【孟子】?良，楚產也。【左傳·僖二年】屈產之乗。【註】屈地生良馬。趙岐以屈產爲地名，誤。　又民業曰產。【孟子】有恆產者有恆心。【前漢·高祖紀】常有大度，不事家人生產作業。　又【五音集韻】大籥似笛，三孔而短。【爾雅·釋樂】大籥謂之產。　又水名。與滻同。【前漢·郊祀志】霸產豐勞。　又與嵼同。【楚辭·九章】思蹇產而不釋。　又姓。【何氏姓苑】彭城人也。【正字通】明產麟，產瓘。　又【五音集韻】所晏切，音訕。生育也。　又【韻補】叶?舉切，數上聲。【漢樂章】安其所，樂終產，樂終產，世繼緒。　又所蹇切，先上聲。【張協登北芒山賦】靈嶽鬱

產字的源字形

字源演变：

金文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
產字的起名意思

暂无。

Produce
chǎn
Same as "production".
Produce
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chǎn］
["Guangyun" is simple and cut, high-yield, and born. ]
The new glyph of "Production 1". "Production 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Nurturing; Health.
(2) Refers to children born and raised.
(3) Birth; growth.
(4) Production.
(5) Produced goods; property.
(6) Industry.
(7) Life; life industry.
(8) Produce; happen.
(9) Refers to a disorder.
(10) Refers to things in general.
(11) Livestock.
(12) The name of the ancient wind instrument. A kind of.
(13) Use the same as "浐". Water name.
(14) Last name. See "The Genealogy of Wan Xing·Lu Yun".
Produce
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [New Character Department] 　 Produce; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 755 Page 09
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] When you cut, the sound is cut. [Said Wen] Sheng Ye. 【Zhengzitong】Women to give birth to children are called births, and material births are also called births. 【Rituals·Songshang Liquor】He who produces all things is a saint. [Note] The words of the holy are also born. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Da Zong Bo】Take natural fortune as a yin virtue, and defend it with courtesy. Use real estate as a positive virtue, and defend it with peace. 【Note】Natural animals are the genus of six animals. The real estate plant is a genus of Kutani. 【Pre-Han·Zhaodi Period】Nine stems of Jinzhi, produced in the bronze pond of Hande Hall.　The place where it grew up is called production. [Mencius]? Good, Chu is also born. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi 2 Years] The multiplication of yield yield. [Note] Qu Di produces good horses. Zhao Qi mistakenly used Quchan as the place name.　The people's industry is called production. [Mencius] Those who have permanent birth have perseverance. [Former Han·Gaozu Ji] Often generous, not concerned with family production.　[Pentagram Rhyme] The big sound is like a flute, three holes and short. [Erya·Shile] Daxue is said to be a property.　Also known as water. Same as Chan. [Pre-Han · Jiao Si Zhi] Dominate production and abundant labor.　 Same with Wei again. [Songs of the Chu Nine Chapters] Thinking of producing but not releasing.　Another last name. [Ho's Surname Garden] Pengcheng is also a native. [Zhengzitong] Ming Chanlin, birth gall.　[Five Tone Collection Rhyme] So Yan cut, and the sound is dissatisfied. Fertility also.　[Rhyme Supplement] Ye? Lift and cut, count on the sound. [Han Music] Peace of mind, happy final birth, happy final birth, continuation of the world.　 Cut again, let's go first. [Zhang Xie Deng Beimang Mountain Fu] Lingyueyu
